mapper.sql:
SELECT a.assign_date , a.follow_id ,a.customer_type , a.cus_intention_type,
b.invite_code flowUpInviteCode,b.name followUp,
c.id, c.link_person , c.bank_name , c.create_date , c.card_valid_date ,c.bank_sign_date , c.mobile, c.bank_sign , c.record_invite_code , c.id_card ,
IFNULL(d.total_in_cash, 0) inCash, d.frist_in_cash_date , IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) totalFund,
IFNULL(f.outCash, 0) dayOutCash, IFNULL(f.inCash, 0) dayInCash, f.dayLastInCashTime, f.dayLastOutCashTime

from follow_agent a
left join ( select id,invite_code,name,disable from follow_up )b on a.follow_id=b.id
left join ( select id, link_person , bank_name , create_date , card_valid_date ,bank_sign_date , mobile, bank_sign , record_invite_code ,id_card, account_id,uc_id,bank_account from ${assistDataBase}.agent where del_status != -1 )c on c.id = a.agent_id
left join ${assistDataBase}.finance_account d on d.id = c.account_id
left join ( SELECT pay_uc_id, MAX( CASE WHEN pay_type = '1' THEN accrual END ) AS inCash, MAX(CASE WHEN pay_type = '-114' THEN accrual END ) AS outCash, MAX(CASE WHEN pay_type = '1' THEN createDate END ) AS dayLastInCashTime, MAX(CASE WHEN pay_type = '-114' THEN createDate END ) AS dayLastOutCashTime FROM ( SELECT pay_uc_id,`pay_type`,SUM(accrual) accrual,MAX(`create_date`)createDate FROM ${assistDataBase}.finance_account_log WHERE create_date BETWEEN #{startStr} and #{endStr} AND pay_type IN (1,-114) and account_type = 0 GROUP BY pay_uc_id,`pay_type` )f1 GROUP BY `pay_uc_id` )f ON c.uc_id = f.pay_uc_id
left join ( SELECT agent_id,GROUP_CONCAT( bank_id ORDER BY bank_id ) bank_ids FROM ${assistDataBase}.finance_vitrual_account GROUP BY agent_id )g ON c.id = g.agent_id
WHERE 1 = 1 and b.disable != -1

-- 页面查询条件 -- 客户类型
AND a.customer_type =#{searchVo.customerType}
-- 页面查询条件：跟进人
AND b.name like CONCAT('%','${searchVo.followUp}','%')
-- 大易相关表查询条件 -- 今日待联系代理商的ID集合
and c.id in
#{item}
and 0 = 1
-- 下面是页面查询条件 -- 是否实名认证
AND c.id_card is not null
AND c.id_card is null
-- 是否绑卡
AND c.bank_account is null
AND c.bank_account is not null
-- 已开通结算银行
and g.bank_ids like CONCAT('%','${searchVo.bankTypeStr}','%' )
-- 客户总资产
-- 总资产为0
AND IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) = 0
-- 2W及2W以下(不包括0)不包括0
AND 0 < IFNULL (d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) AND IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <= 20000
-- 2W~10W
AND 20000 < IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) AND IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <= 100000
-- 10W~50W
AND 100000 < IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) AND IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <= 500000
-- 50W~100W
AND 500000 < IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) AND IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <= 1000000
-- 100W~300W
AND 1000000 < IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) AND IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <= 3000000
-- 300W以上
AND IFNULL(d.useable + d.frozen + d.out_frozen + 0.8*d.cargo_interest+d.cargo_interest_puchas, 0) > 3000000
-- 是否入金
AND ifnull(d.total_in_cash,0) > 0
AND ifnull(d.total_in_cash,0) <= 0
-- 今日是否入金
AND ifnull(f.inCash,0) > 0
AND (ifnull(f.inCash,0) <= 0 or f.inCash is null)
-- 今日是否出金
AND ifnull(f.outCash,0) > 0
AND (ifnull(f.outCash,0) <= 0 or f.outCash is null)
AND c.mobile like CONCAT('%','${searchVo.mobile}','%' )
-- 页面查询条件：邀请码
AND c.record_invite_code like CONCAT('%','${searchVo.inviteCode}','%' )
-- 根据分配日期排序 ORDER BY a.assign_date DESC

SELECT b.id,link_person,create_date,mobile,bank_name bank,id_card,bank_account, follow_id, assign_date,c.name followUp,record_invite_code inviteCode from follow_agent a left join ( SELECT id,link_person,create_date,mobile,bank_name ,id_card,bank_account,record_invite_code,audit_date from ${assistDataBase}.agent where del_status !=-1 )b on b.id = a.agent_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id,name from follow_up )c on c.id = a.follow_id where b.id is not null and c.id is not null
order by b.audit_date desc

SELECT a.id,link_person,create_date,mobile,bank_name bank,id_card,bank_account,record_invite_code inviteCode,audit_date from ${assistDataBase}.agent a CROSS join ( SELECT agent_id,follow_id from follow_agent )b on b.agent_id =a.id where del_status !=-1 and b.follow_id is null
order by a.audit_date desc
